devdoc.author: Julien Lampin

addGuardian(address,string).details: Will be applyed to current user, if no user exist, user will be created

params._guardianAddress: address of the guardian to add
params._name: name of the guardian, only used for user friendly display

confirmGuardian().details: can only be used by the guardian itself

returns._0: User that sender address is protecting

getUnlockedSecrets().details: can only be used by the guardian itself

returns._0: The guardian related current secret (this secret is encrypt using guardian key)

lock(string[],uint256).details: _shares should be in the same order as guardians

params._shares: parts of the secret crypted with guardian key
params.threashold: minimum number of shares needed to unlock the secret

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeGuardian(address).details: Allowed only if number of remaining guardian is higher or equal than threashold

params._guardianAddress: address of the guardian to revoke

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlock(address,string).details: if account was in recovery we initialise the recovery mode by setting the _recoveryUserAddress

params._recoveryUserAddress: recovery address used to encrypt the unlocked secret
params.unlockedSecret: decrypt secret from guardian, re-encrypted with user recovery address

devdoc.title: SocialRecovery contract used for DeaNa APP

GuardianStatusChange(address,address,uin.notice: GuardianStatus indicate in which state the guardian currently is

addGuardian(address,string).notice: Add a new guardian for the user

getProtectedUser().notice: Return the user related to a specific guardian (Assuming here (for the v1) that address can only be used to protect one account)

getRecoverUser().notice: Return the user related to a specific recovered address

getUser().notice: Return the user related to caller address

lock(string[],uint256).notice: Lock the user account by putting shares on each guardians

revokeGuardian(address).notice: Revoke a guardian, removing it for user guardian list

unlock(address,string).notice: Unlock a secret by adding the unlockedSecret to the guardian

userdoc.notice: This contract allow you to protect your private key (or any information) with guardians. Theses guardian will be able to unlock the secret if enough of them enable it
